kth.csc.inda
Class ListGraph

java.lang.Object
  kth.csc.inda.ListGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class ListGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph

An graph with a fixed number of vertices implemented using adjacency lists. Space complexity is Θ(n + m) where n is the number of vertices and m the number of edges.

Version:
[Date]
Author:
[Name]
